oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Kitāb Fatḥ al-jawād bi-sharḥ Manẓūmat Ibn al-ʻImād / taṣnīf al-Shaykh al-Imām al-ʻĀlim al-ʻAllāmah shaykhinā wa-mawlānā Abū al-ʻAbbās al-Shihāb Aḥmad al-Ramlī al-Anṣārī al-Khazrajī : manuscript, 1542
Fatḥ al-jawād bi-sharḥ Manẓūmat Ibn al-ʻImād
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Ramlī, Aḥmad ibn Aḥmad , -1563 or 1564
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Master Microforms, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: بسم الله الرحمن الرحيم الحمد لله الذي بعث محمد صلى الله عليه وسلم رحمة للعالمين ... :Incipit
وكان الفرغ من نصخ هذا المجموع المبارك يوم الجمعة سادس شهر جمادى الاخر سنة تسعة واربعين وتسعماية ... :Colophon
Written in one column, 18 or 19 lines per page, in black rubricated in red.
Fatḥ al-jawād (ff. 7v-38r) is preceded by the text of the "Manẓūmah" (ff. 1r-7r); beginning of the poem is missing.

According to colophon (f. 38r), copy completed on 6 Jumādá al-Ākhir [sic] 949 AH [September 16, 1542 AD]. Copy is collated with the author's own copy (on the margin of f. 38r): "balagha muqābalatuhu wa-taṣḥ[īḥuhu] ʻalá aṣl muʼallifihi wa-lillāh al-ḥamd."
The composition of the book was finished by his author on 3 Ṣafar 940 AH [August 24, 1533] (f. 38r).
MS Arab 301. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Ibn al-ʻImād al-Aqfahsī, Aḥmad--approximately 1349-1405
